questions.question: The main principle used in Interference is ____?

explanations.b: Superposition principle is the basic principle used in the interference of light. When the incoming light waves superimpose constructively, the intensity increases while when they add destructively, it decreases.

questions.question: When Two waves of same amplitude add constructively, the intensity becomes ____?

explanations.c: As we know, I ∝ A2. Thus, as the two waves add constructively, their amplitude becomes twice and hence the intensity becomes four times.
